name: EUROPEAN FEDERATION OF BUILDING AND WOODWORKERS
goal:
The EFBWW is the representative body at European level defending the interests of workers in the Europen construction, wood, furniture and forestry sectors. THe EFBWW has 75 affiliated organisations from 34 countries, representing 2 million workers.
The EFBWW is a recognised European social partner for the construction, wood and furniture sectors.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Posting and migration
Public procurement
REFIT
Occupational health and safety
Energy efficiency in Buildings
Regulations on Non Road Mobile Machinery,
Internal Market and competition policies
Labour law and social protection/security
Pensions
Youth matters
Labour market organisation and development
Industrial relations
Worker participation and EWC
Vocational and educational training
